name: BODC Series 1177530
description: Dataset metadata for BODC Series Reference Number 1177530

about.name: Collection Event related to BODC Series 1177530

keywords: Dissolved oxygen parameters in the water column
Chlorophyll pigment concentrations in water bodies
Transmittance and attenuance of the water column
Transmittance and attenuance of the water column
Electrical conductivity of the water column
Dissolved oxygen parameters in the water column

variableMeasured.name: Pres_Z
variableMeasured.description: Pressure (spatial coordinate) exerted by the water body by profiling pressure sensor and correction to read zero at sea level

variableMeasured.name: WC_dissO2_IS
variableMeasured.description: Concentration of oxygen {O2 CAS 7782-44-7} per unit volume of the water body [dissolved plus reactive particulate phase] by in-situ sensor

variableMeasured.name: chl-a_water_ISfluor
variableMeasured.description: Concentration of chlorophyll-a {chl-a CAS 479-61-8} per unit volume of the water body [particulate >unknown phase] by in-situ chlorophyll fluorometer

variableMeasured.name: Trans_Red_25cm
variableMeasured.description: Transmittance (red light wavelength) per 25cm of the water body by 25cm path length red light transmissometer

variableMeasured.name: SigTheta
variableMeasured.description: Sigma-theta of the water body by CTD and computation from salinity and potential temperature using UNESCO algorithm

variableMeasured.name: HeightAboveBed
variableMeasured.description: Height (spatial coordinate) relative to bed surface in the water body

variableMeasured.name: Atten_red
variableMeasured.description: Attenuation (red light wavelength) per unit length of the water body by 20 or 25cm path length transmissometer

variableMeasured.name: P_sal_CTD
variableMeasured.description: Practical salinity of the water body by CTD and computation using UNESCO 1983 algorithm

variableMeasured.name: Vol2MassCTD
variableMeasured.description: Conversion factor (volume to mass) for the water body by CTD and computation of density (in-situ potential temperature surface pressure) reciprocal from pressure, temperature and salinity

variableMeasured.name: CTDCond
variableMeasured.description: Electrical conductivity of the water body by CTD

variableMeasured.name: BK_SBE43
variableMeasured.description: Saturation of oxygen {O2 CAS 7782-44-7} in the water body [dissolved plus reactive particulate phase] by Sea-Bird SBE 43 sensor and calibration against sample data and computation from concentration using Benson and Krause algorithm

variableMeasured.name: OxyProbeOut1
variableMeasured.description: Raw signal (voltage) of instrument output by in-situ microelectrode

variableMeasured.name: WC_temp_CTD
variableMeasured.description: Temperature of the water body by CTD or STD

variableMeasured.name: WC_Potemp
variableMeasured.description: Potential temperature of the water body by computation using UNESCO 1983 algorithm
